channel.title: I got a problem with path and classpath
channel.description: hey every1, i hope some1 could help me, when i tried to make my own rs p server, at a step they ask u to change the variabale value for the path and the classpath (RIGHT CLICK ON MY COMPUTER-PROPERTIES-ADVANCED-ENVIRONMENT VARIABALES-PATH AND CLASS PATH) so i changed them, and now i cant enter anyclient of any rs pserver, and when i try to enter the clients it says :" Java is not recognized as an internet or external command, operable program,or batch file. please help me guys, how can i reset the path and the class path to the default one thanks.

item.title: I got a problem with path and classpath
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

i deleted everything was in classpath and path, but i mean, when i start runescape, java works but when i start any client for a p server, it doesnt work
and i got 6update14 but when runescape starts… the java that works is jav6 update 7.
hope u could help me,coz this problem is annoying
edited:
how can i set the path and the classpath so i can open clients?
please some1 help me

item.title: I got a problem with path and classpath
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

hey every1,
i hope some1 could help me, when i tried to make my own rs p server, at a step they ask u to change the variabale value for the path and the classpath (RIGHT CLICK ON MY COMPUTER-PROPERTIES-ADVANCED-ENVIRONMENT VARIABALES-PATH AND CLASS PATH)
so i changed them, and now i cant enter anyclient of any rs pserver,
and when i try to enter the clients it says :" Java is not recognized as an internet or external command, operable program,or batch file.
please help me guys,
how can i reset the path and the class path to the default one
thanks.
